text: The application is more than wonderful, and the officials in it are respectful and follow up on customer affairs well.. I once had a problem reserving an apartment, and their assistance to me was very excellent 10/10, so that the full amount was returned..

title: Siddhartha Boutique Hotel
text: Great hotel relatively close to the airport.  Clean, quite, and service oriented.  Every member of the staff constantly strives to make sure you have an enjoyable stay.  This was my third stay at the hotel and I really believe that for the price, there is not a better hotel in Kathmandu.

title: Best value for my money, maybe ever..!
text:
Amazing experience, you think itâ€™s a cheap motel but itâ€™s nothing short of 100% worth every penny. The owner came out, helped me find the location (itâ€™s not obvious but thatâ€™s a one time deal) and he made sure I knew everything I needed about the area.

Told me where to go out, where to eat, and if you need anything how to find it. The area is empty in the weekend during late hours, probably same during the week, and I always felt very safe. Best curry and roti is a block down the street. 

Fantastic experience, donâ€™t spend hundreds of dollars in Barbados, stay here and youâ€™ll get a simple room thatâ€™s super clean, super fast internet, and a genuine feeling of security when your head finally hits the pillow!

title: Please fix the bugs
text:
Hi support team. I would like to report bugs. This is critical issue, that must be fixed on your side. 
Title: car rental category 
Select pick up and drop off different locations. Select pick up date, then select different drop off date. 
Actual result: pick up date switch automatically to same as dropping off date. No chance to proceed with booking a car. As pick and drop off date same.

Second issue. That is critical as well. 
Title: booking the hotel
Select check in and check out date. Proceeds with booking. Select property and room and navigate to confirmation page. 
Actual result: On confirmation page, the checking in and out date are different. Donâ€™t match the selected.

title: Recommend

title: Ocean view property
text: This property was AMAZING!! The location was perfect downtown Miami. Close to everything! We had a the most beautiful view from both bedrooms! The pool was heated which was perfect if you go during the off season as we did. The jacuzzi was huge which was also a plus! We will definitely be back soon!

title: In tears
text:
I donâ€™t leave many reviews, but Booking.com has been my go to app for years and tonight has solidified them as an app Iâ€™ll use for as long as the company is running. 

My father is having an operation and I live on the other side of the world. I needed to get home ASAP. Every other website was quoting me a two/three day trip for $3,000. Too long and too much money. Booking.com quoted me less than half of that and Iâ€™m going to be at my dads side tomorrow NIGHT! I doubt you guys will ever read this but your company is a blessing and I canâ€™t thank you enough for years and years of wonderful stays. Tonight especially has made me feel so warmly towards you all.

title: What a wonderful stay!
text: We loved our time at Dar Yomma. The staff especially the wonderful lady helped us with questions about tours and our stay at the Dar. So relaxing and a beautiful place for kids. Thank you!

title: Booking

title: App has a bug that automatically changed my reservation dates
text: The dates I tried to book did not match the dates on the confirmation page. This is a huge issue, as I now have to call the hotel to change my dates to my intended dates. Crazy that the Booking.com app has a glitch with the dates and yet doesnâ€™t let users change the dates for free immediately after booking. I called Booking.comâ€™s customer service and they were useless â€” they essentially told me I needed to delete my cookies (didnâ€™t solve the problem) and then told me they couldnâ€™t help.

title: Wrong dates of booking
text: Every time I am trying to book hotel, the dates on the final step shows incorrectly. It shows 1 day off. Steps - choose hotel in Omaha, select room, on final step see dates. Dates one day prior expectations. I need Thursdays it shows Wednesday. Can you please fix it. And add support option in the app for such cases

title: App not working
text: Trying to access customer service is a joke.  Iâ€™ve tried both email and phone, neither offering any kind of resolution.  The property I wanted to reserve would not give me the correct dates on the reservation screen, despite showing those dates on every screen prior to reserving.  Now that I spent half a week trying to get assistance from customer service to no avail, the price has gone up $200 and even if I wanted to reserve at the price, there is still a glitch with the dates.  Please fix your app!
